On Sun, 16 Feb 2003, Daniel Paul Hightower <dph_of_rules@...> wrote:

> I'll add a few comments: the ability to "freeze time" isn't fun on the
> receiving end.  Hypothetically, you could keep time frozen until you
> wipe out the entire enemy force, as long as you have sufficient mana.
>  It gets aggrevating if a friendly mage keeps freezing time when the
> rest of your team is out of mana.

Well, any time freezing is extremely annoying in multiplayer games. I
think htat if Openglad becomes a suitable game for mostly multiplayer
things, then the time freezing would have to be either greatly reformed or
diminished a lot.

> Barbarians really do need more attacks.

Indeed they do. I liked the list that someone sent in, especially
battlecry.
